local_intent: Detect the brown_object, compute a top grasp pose, align, execute pinch grasp at goal_pose, and verify stability
assumptions: Pinch grasp can securely hold the object
coherence_with_global: Implements the grasp phase of the GLOBAL_BT fallback: DetectObject -> ComputeGraspPose(goal_pose, top) -> GraspAtPose(goal_pose, pinch) -> CloseGripper -> IsGraspStable.
